```{r}
w_deaths_2015_2021_ar_pop <- read_rds("data/BfS-closed/w_deaths_2015_2021_ar_pop.Rds")

w_deaths_2015_2021_pop <- read_rds("data/BfS-closed/w_deaths_2015_2021_pop.Rds")

w_deaths_2015_2021_ar_pop %>% 
  group_by(year) %>% 
  summarise(deaths = sum(deaths))
```

```{r}
frq(w_deaths_2015_2021_ar_pop, deaths > population) 

w_deaths_2015_2021_ar_pop %>% 
  filter(deaths > population)

w_deaths_2015_2021_ar_pop %<>% 
  mutate(population = if_else(deaths > population, deaths, population))
```

```{r}
frq(w_deaths_2015_2021_pop, deaths > population) 

w_deaths_2015_2021_pop %>% 
  filter(deaths > population)

w_deaths_2015_2021_pop %<>% 
  mutate(population = if_else(deaths > population, deaths, population))
```
